sentence.Network_en: It was an inconceivably stupid thing to have done.
sentence.Network_cn: 岂有此理,他竟干出了如此蠢事!

sentence.Network_en: The task proved inconceivably more difficult than we had imagined.
sentence.Network_cn: 任务的困难程度超过我们的想像,确实难以置信.

auth_sentence.content: If we did not have Europe the cost would be inconceivably high.
